actions.committee: House Committee on Science, Space and Technology
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science, Space and Technology.

official_title: To authorize the National Aeronautics and Space Administration to purchase approximately 8 acres of land at the Fort Sumner Municipal Airport, De Baca County, New Mexico.
short_title: Scientific Balloon Launch Site Act of 1990

summary.text: Scientific Balloon Launch Site Act of 1990 - Authorizes the Administrator of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration to purchase approximately eight specified acres of land in New Mexico to use as a balloon launching facility.

titles.title: Scientific Balloon Launch Site Act of 1990
To authorize the National Aeronautics and Space Administration to purchase approximately 8 acres of land at the Fort Sumner Municipal Airport, De Baca County, New Mexico.
